actions.name: Sweet Veil
actions.description: Effect: The user is immune to the @Affliction[drowsy] and @Affliction[nightmares] Afflictions. The duration of @Affliction[drowsy] and @Affliction[nightmares] affecting allied creatures within 10m of the user are reduced by 2 instead of 1 at the end of each of their Activations.
